pages.title: SensorHub Overview
pages.purpose: Introduction to the SensorHub intelligent monitoring system, its purpose, and key capabilities

pages.title: Quick Start Guide
pages.purpose: Step-by-step instructions for installing dependencies, setting up the database, and running the application

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: High-level overview of the system's architecture, component relationships, and design patterns

pages.title: Technology Stack
pages.purpose: Detailed breakdown of frameworks, libraries, and dependencies with version information and their roles

pages.title: Application Layers
pages.purpose: Explanation of the presentation, application, business logic, and data layers and their interactions

pages.title: Data Flow and Communication Patterns
pages.purpose: How data flows through the system from sensors to database to web clients, including real-time updates

pages.title: Backend Components
pages.purpose: Overview of server-side components including Flask application, database layer, and data models

pages.title: Node Network Architecture and Communication
pages.purpose: Complete documentation of Nodes, Gateway, mqtt, mosquitto, Painlessmesh

pages.title: Flask Application Server (app.py)
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the main Flask application, including initialization, routes, and SocketIO configuration

pages.title: HTTP Route Handlers
pages.purpose: Detailed documentation of all HTTP endpoints, their parameters, return values, and use cases

pages.title: WebSocket Event Handlers
pages.purpose: Documentation of SocketIO events, both client-initiated and server-broadcast events

pages.title: Sensor Data Ingestion and Normalization
pages.purpose: How the system receives sensor data via POST /datos, field name normalization, and validation

pages.title: Database Module (database.py)
pages.purpose: Complete documentation of the data persistence layer, ORM models, and all database access functions

pages.title: DatosSensor Data Model
pages.purpose: Detailed specification of the sensor data model including all fields, types, nullability, and the to_dict() method

pages.title: Database Access Functions
pages.purpose: Reference for all 11 database functions including write operations, read operations, and metadata queries

pages.title: Database Schema
pages.purpose: SQLite database schema documentation including table structure, column types, and indexing strategy

pages.title: Frontend Components
pages.purpose: Overview of the web interface including templates, styling system, and client-side JavaScript

pages.title: Styling System and Theme Management
pages.purpose: CSS architecture including custom properties, theme switching, responsive design, and component styles

pages.title: CSS Variables and Design Tokens
pages.purpose: Documentation of all CSS custom properties for colors, backgrounds, borders, and shadows in both light and dark themes

pages.title: Responsive Design and Breakpoints
pages.purpose: Media query strategy, breakpoint definitions, and layout transformations for tablet and mobile views

pages.title: Dashboard Interface (index.html)
pages.purpose: Main monitoring panel with status indicators, metrics cards, map visualization, and activity feed

pages.title: Dashboard Data Binding and Jinja2 Templates
pages.purpose: How backend data (nodos, total_registros, ultimo_dato, mapa) is passed to and rendered in the dashboard

pages.title: Map Visualization with Folium
pages.purpose: How geographic sensor distribution is generated on the backend and embedded in the dashboard

pages.title: Real-time Data Table (tabla.html)
pages.purpose: WebSocket-powered live data display with status indicators, automatic updates, and 100-row buffer management

pages.title: WebSocket Client Implementation
pages.purpose: Socket.IO client initialization, event handling, connection lifecycle, and error management

pages.title: Dynamic DOM Updates and Row Management
pages.purpose: The agregarFilaDesdeObjeto function, row insertion strategy, and 100-row limit enforcement

pages.title: Conditional Field Rendering
pages.purpose: How the campos dictionary controls which sensor fields and charts are displayed for heterogeneous nodes

pages.title: Chart.js Integration
pages.purpose: Canvas elements, data preparation for charts, and visualization of temperature, humidity, soil moisture, and light

pages.title: Client-Side Theme Management
pages.purpose: JavaScript implementation of theme detection, localStorage persistence, and dynamic theme switching

pages.title: API Reference
pages.purpose: Complete reference documentation for all HTTP endpoints, WebSocket events, and database functions
